summary: This is an email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorneys regarding the deadline to disclose victim identities to the defense in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It includes an updated version of a letter to be sent to the defense, noting the addition of information about the victims' counsel.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case for which victim identities are being disclosed to the defense.

events.title: Deadline for victim identity disclosure in Maxwell case
events.description: The prosecution's deadline to disclose the identities of victims to the defense team in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The prosecution had a deadline on September 13, 2021, to disclose victim identities to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.
The correspondence involves Assistant United States Attorneys from the Southern District of New York.
An updated letter was prepared for the defense, which included added information about the victims' legal counsel.
